content.p: Abstract submission for the Malaysian Psychology Conference is now closed. We have had a fantastic response to the call for abstracts, with over 100 abstracts submitted. If you submitted an absttract, we aim to inform you if your talk or poster has been accepted by Monday 5th September 2011. Delegates whose abstracts are accepted for talk or poster presentations must register for the conference by 22nd September. Talk slots for talks are 15 mins, with an additional 5 mins for questions. Poster format will be announced in due course. Please note that this conference will take place in English. Accordingly, all talks and posters MUST be in English. Nearer the date of the conference, a non-peer-reviewed, online publication "Abstracts of Proceedings of the Malaysian Psychology Conference" will be produced containing the abstracts of the oral and poster presentations at the conference. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
